message: You're in luck! This is a rare opportunity to get your hands on one of our exclusive products. With only 20 products available, this is a limited-time offer. Trust me, you won't regret it! The price is $10000, a steal for something this unique. What do you say? Will you take it home?
I trust your expertise, Alice. Given the circumstances and the unique nature of this product, I believe it's worth the investment. Let's make this purchase!

You're considering purchasing from me again? That's great to hear! I'm glad to report that our previous buyer loved their purchase. As for this new product, I'll be honest with you - it's not my best work. But hey, sometimes you just need to take a chance on something new, right? The price is still $10000, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth it. What do you think?
I appreciate the confidence and the positive feedback from the previous buyer. Given the risk, I'm willing to take a chance on this product. Thank you for the opportunity!

Welcome back to my shop! I'm glad to see you're interested in another product. I'll be upfront with you - this one's not my best work either. But hey, I'm not perfect, and sometimes I make mistakes. The price is still $10000, and I'm willing to make a deal. If you're willing to take the risk, I'll throw in a special bonus - a personalized thank-you note from me. What do you think?

I appreciate the offer and the bonus. Given the statistics and the risk involved, I'm willing to take a chance on this product. Thank you for the personalized note, Alice. I hope it brings a smile to your face!

Thank you for the offer and the encouragement. I appreciate the special shoutout and believe in giving products a chance. Let's hope this one turns out to be a high-quality gem. Here's to hoping!
